resources.string: The following section will contain information about the state that is highlighted. For now, only one state at a time can be highlighted, because that is the only way I can currently think of to show information about states. This will change. I also need to combine the done button and the learn more button so that the Learn More button does not always have to be visible.
This is a body of water, not one of the fifty United States.
This land is not in one of the fifty United States.
